001package edu.pdx.cs410J.java8;

003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
006
007public class MethodReferences {
008
009  public static void main(String[] args) {
010
011    Runnable run = IllegalStateException::new;
012    Callable<List> call = ArrayList::new;
013
014  }
015}
